file_content.text: Keep up the good work!
You've done enough for us. Colonel Hunt is waiting for you at the Upper Sundari Outpost--and don't forget that droid data.
The Imperials aren't content with just attacking here. They've launched a major assault to retake the Balmorran Arms Factory.
I've seen the weapons and droids Balmorran Arms produces. We can't let it fall back into the Empire's hands.
That factory can't be lost!
Maybe the Imperial attack here was meant to keep our attention away from Balmorran Arms.
Was all this a distraction?
If that's true... if they murdered innocent people as a ruse--I wish you'd killed every one of them!
That's not really my problem.
I suppose Commander Madine thought he could count on you for help.
Commander Madine asked you to head to the Upper Sundari Outpost as fast as you can. Colonel Hunt's the officer in charge.
Before you go... I have something for the Republic. A gesture of friendship, from the resistance.
What kind of gesture?
I never say "no" to presents.
The Republic doesn't need gifts. We know we can count on the resistance.
That's kind, but unnecessary.
Well, we wouldn't be much of an ally if we didn't share intelligence.
Hurry this up.
We captured and rewired several Imperial probe droids. They've been spying on Imperial forces in the Sundari Flatlands.
If you download the data those probe droids have gathered for us, I bet Colonel Hunt could put it to good use.
Thank you, Wixx. I'll see that he gets it.
I'm sure he will.
I'll go and get the data.
If you'd been quicker to share, this intelligence could have prevented the Imperial attack.
Why not give it to us earlier?
Our technician was killed in the field. We couldn't retrieve the droids remotely. And then the Empire came.
Be careful. I hope Colonel Hunt appreciates the help he's getting.
I honestly thought Gabe should have sent a team twice as big. But you really came through.
I honestly thought your reputation was exaggerated. But you really came through.
Some in the outpost are saying that the Imperials would never have attacked if... if people like you hadn't provoked them.
But even if that's true.. you were here when we needed help. Thank you.
What the Empire has done to Balmorra is wrong. But letting its actions go unpunished would have been a greater evil.
Jedi always oppose darkness.
The Republic military never backs down against the Empire.
Fighting Imperials is my job.
Glad you see it that way. I didn't much fancy being chased off by an angry mob.
Well, that's a relief.
You're welcome.
It was a trivial task.
Payment, please.
But I thought... okay. I'll see what I can do.
I wish I could leave it at "thank you," but Commander Madine just contacted me--he's head of the Republic military forces on Balmorra.
Talk to Rond Berrin and Daven Tam. They'd be grateful for your help.
I hope you know how to use those weapons. We've never needed friends more than now.
The Empire's killed so many. We're still finding wounded, and people are missing... I don't even know where my cousin's family is.
The Imperial soldiers were ordered to attack undefended, helpless civilians. There are no military targets here!
Nothing ever excuses killing innocent people.
This is horrific.
It's accepted that the Empire will attack military targets. But this....
Appalling. Even war has rules.
Blasted Imperials. They're called non-combatants for a reason.
The Empire's crossed the line.
That's terrible.
I thought the Imperial leadership here was falling apart. Who's leading these forces?
Who gave that order?
A Sith who took command. The Imperials call him Lord Tharsis.
What else would you expect from Imperials?
That's the Empire for you.
The Imperial soldiers are being led by a Sith--Lord Tharsis, they call him.
Lord Tharsis ordered the attack on Moraine Territory to punish us for rebelling--and for everything the Empire's suffered. If he can't break us, he'll just kill everything we care about.
It sounds like the Imperial forces would scatter without him. He should be our target.
Let's focus on Tharsis, then.
No one else will suffer. I promise.
Not on my watch.
Or, we kill him first.
We gathered intelligence on Lord Tharsis--troop movements and such. But the teams who went to fight him never came back.
Honestly, you'd do more good by helping people here. Too many could die while we're focused on one man, even if he is a Sith.
If Lord Tharsis isn't stopped, these people won't be safe no matter what happens.
We should still handle him.
I can't stop you. But please don't do anything rash.
That makes sense.
Then tell me what you need.
Several civilians say the Empire's brought in Mandalorian mercenaries--they're ruthless, worse than the Imperials. Rond Berrin's looking into it.
And the Empire's been rounding up people from the local villages. They're... it's a long story. But Captain Daven Tam's been trying to help them.
I'll talk to them both.
I'd better get to work.
I'll try not to get bored.
We'd appreciate anything you can do. Let me know if you're successful.
If you see anyone who needs help, please just grab a medkit.
